proof_script:
lemma vcg_of_SPEC: assumes "f \<equiv> do { ASSERT pre; SPEC post }" shows "\<lbrakk>pre; SPEC post \<le> m\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> f \<le> m" and "\<lbrakk>pre \<Longrightarrow> SPEC post \<le>\<^sub>n m\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> f \<le>\<^sub>n m"
using assms
by (auto simp: pw_leof_iff refine_pw_simps)

agent_info.successful_proof:
lemma vcg_of_SPEC: assumes "f \<equiv> do { ASSERT pre; SPEC post }" shows "\<lbrakk>pre; SPEC post \<le> m\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> f \<le> m" and "\<lbrakk>pre \<Longrightarrow> SPEC post \<le>\<^sub>n m\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> f \<le>\<^sub>n m"
using assms
by (auto simp: pw_leof_iff refine_pw_simps)
